<wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#Bank_userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>VIP_BankUser</urn2:endToEndIdentification> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(4).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#AccountID}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <urn3:debtor> <urn2:name>Shiny</urn2:name> level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK"> <urn2:amount>10</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <urn4:creditor> <urn2:name>Miller</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccount}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> <urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured>HI</urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured> </urn1:transaction> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
